YouDrive_Team11.Persistence
Class YouDriveDAO

java.lang.Object
  YouDrive_Team11.Persistence.YouDriveDAO

public class YouDriveDAO
extends java.lang.Object

The persistence class for the YouDrive system.

Author:
David Stapleton

createCustomer

public Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String password,
                               java.lang.String emailAddress,
                               java.lang.String firstName,
                               java.lang.String lastName,
                               java.sql.Date membershipExpiration,
                               java.lang.String addrLine1,
                               java.lang.String addrLine2,
                               java.lang.String city,
                               java.lang.String state,
                               int ZIP,
                               java.lang.String country,
                               java.lang.String DLNumber,
                               java.lang.String DLState)
Adds a customer to the database and returns an instance of a Customer object

Parameters:
username - The username of the customer
password - The password of the customer
emailAddress - The email address of the customer
firstName - The customer's first name
lastName - The customer's last name
membershipExpiration - The customer's membership expiration date
addrLine1 - The first line of the customer's address
addrLine2 - The second line of the customer's address
city - The city of the customer's address
state - The state of the customer's address
ZIP - The ZIP code of the customer's address
country - The country of the customer's address
DLNumber - The driver's license number of the customer
DLState - The driver's license state of the customer
Returns:
A customer object, encapsulating all the customer's data

updateAddressForCustomer

public Address updateAddressForCustomer(int id,
                                        java.lang.String addrLine1,
                                        java.lang.String addrLine2,
                                        java.lang.String city,
                                        java.lang.String state,
                                        int ZIP,
                                        java.lang.String country)
If an address exists for a customer, it is updated with the new information. If there isn't an address for a customer, one is added to the database.

Parameters:
id - The unique identifier of the customer to assign this address to
addrLine1 - The first line of the address
addrLine2 - The second line of the address
city - The city of the address
state - The state of the address
ZIP - The zip code of the address
country - The country of the address
Returns:
An address object with the updated information.

addPaymentInfoForCustomer

public PaymentInfo addPaymentInfoForCustomer(int customerID,
                                             java.lang.String cardNumber,
                                             int expirationMonth,
                                             int expirationYear,
                                             int securityCode,
                                             java.lang.String addrLine1,
                                             java.lang.String addrLine2,
                                             java.lang.String city,
                                             java.lang.String state,
                                             int ZIP,
                                             java.lang.String country)
Adds payment info for a customer.

Parameters:
customerID - The unique identifier of the customer for which we are adding payment information
cardNumber - The card number
expirationMonth - The card's month of expiry
expirationYear - The card's year of expiry
securityCode - The card's security code
addrLine1 - The first line of the card's billing address
addrLine2 - The second line of the card's billing address
city - The city of the card's billing address
state - The state of the card's billing address
ZIP - The ZIP code of the card's billing address
country - The country of the card's billing address
Returns:
A PaymentInfo object encapsulating all this new data.

updatePaymentInfoForCustomer

public void updatePaymentInfoForCustomer(int customerID,
                                         java.lang.String cardNumber,
                                         int expirationMonth,
                                         int expirationYear,
                                         int securityCode)
Updates the payment information associated with a YouDrive customer

Parameters:
customerID - The unique identifier of the customer for which we are updating payment info
cardNumber - The new card number
expirationMonth - The new card's month of expiration
expirationYear - The new card's year of expiration
securityCode - The new card's security code

updateAddressForPaymentInfo

public Address updateAddressForPaymentInfo(int payment_id,
                                           java.lang.String addrLine1,
                                           java.lang.String addrLine2,
                                           java.lang.String city,
                                           java.lang.String state,
                                           int ZIP,
                                           java.lang.String country)
If an address already exists for given payment info, it is updated. If not, a new address is created in the YouDrive system for the payment data.

Parameters:
payment_id - The unique identifier of the payment information for which this address should be linked
addrLine1 - The first line of the card's billing address
addrLine2 - The second line of the card's billing address
city - The city of the card's billing address
state - The state of the card's billing address
ZIP - The ZIP code of the card's billing address
country - The country of the card's billing address
Returns:
An address object containing the address for a given payment info

updateDLForCustomer

public DriversLicense updateDLForCustomer(int custID,
                                          java.lang.String DLNumber,
                                          java.lang.String DLState)
If a DL exists for a customer, it is updated. If a DL is not found in the system, a new one is created.

Parameters:
custID - The unique identifier of the customer to link the DL to
DLNumber - The driver's license number
DLState - The driver's license state of issue
Returns:
The updated driver's license

createVehicle

public Vehicle createVehicle(java.lang.String make,
                             java.lang.String model,
                             int year,
                             java.lang.String tag,
                             int mileage,
                             java.sql.Date serviceDate,
                             java.lang.String condition,
                             int vehicle_type,
                             int location)
Adds a vehicle to the YouDrive system and returns a Vehicle object

Parameters:
make - The make of the car (i.e. "Toyota")
model - The model of the car (i.e. "Camry")
year - The year of the car
tag - The tag of the car
mileage - The current mileage of the car
serviceDate - The date of last service
condition - The condition of the car ("good, excellent, etc")
vehicle_type - The unique identifier of the associated vehicle type
location - The unique identifier of the associated rental location
Returns:
A Vehicle object encapsulating this data

tag - The new tag
mileage - The new mileage
serviceDate - The new last date of service
condition - The new condition of the vehicle
vehicle_type - The new id of the vehicle type
location - The new location of the vehicle type

createRentalLocation

public RentalLocation createRentalLocation(java.lang.String name,
                                           int capacity,
                                           java.lang.String addrLine1,
                                           java.lang.String addrLine2,
                                           java.lang.String city,
                                           java.lang.String state,
                                           int ZIP,
                                           java.lang.String country)
Creates a rental location in the YouDrive system

Parameters:
name - The name of the location (ex. Southside)
capacity - The maximum number of vehicles this location can hold
addrLine1 - Line 1 of the address
addrLine2 - Line 2 of the address
city - Rental location address city
state - Rental location address state
ZIP - Rental location zip code
country - Rental location country
Returns:
A RentalLocation object encapsulating this new data

readRentalLocation

public RentalLocation readRentalLocation(int locationID)
Retrieves the rental location from the YouDrive system associated with the given unique identifier

Parameters:
locationID - The unique identifier of the rental location for which we are searching
Returns:
A RentalLocation object given by the unique ID.

getAllRentalLocations

public java.util.LinkedList<RentalLocation> getAllRentalLocations()
Returns a list of rental locations in the YouDrive system. Each RentalLocation object contains a list of Vehicle objects located at that location.

Returns:
A LinkedList of Vehicle objects at a location

createReservation

public Reservation createReservation(java.sql.Date pickupTime,
                                     double rentalDuration,
                                     boolean isHourly,
                                     java.sql.Date timeDue,
                                     int vehicle_id,
                                     int location_id,
                                     int customer_id)
Adds a reservation for a vehicle to the YouDrive system

Parameters:
pickupTime - The date/time the vehicle can be picked up
rentalDuration - The rental duration, in either hours or days depending on rental type
isHourly - Whether the rental is hourly (true) or daily (false)
timeDue - The date/time the vehicle is due to be returned
vehicle_id - The unique identifier of the vehicle we are renting
location_id - The unique identifier of the rental location to pickup from
customer_id - The unique identifier of the customer placing the reservation
Returns:
A Reservation object, encapsulating this reservation data.
